headline.main: Detroit Pawn Shop Looking to Sell Jack Kevorkian's Van
headline.print_headline: Detroit Pawn Shop Looking to Sell Jack Kevorkian's Van

docs.snippet: A 1968 Volkswagen van once owned by assisted suicide advocate Jack Kevorkian is up for sale at a Detroit pawn shop even though the late pathologist once dropped it off for scrap....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 1968 Volkswagen van once owned by assisted suicide advocate Jack Kevorkian is up for sale at a Detroit pawn shop even though the late pathologist once dropped it off for scrap.

headline.main: Ashley Madison Users in US Sue Cheating Website Over Breach
headline.print_headline: Ashley Madison Users in US Sue Cheating Website Over Breach

docs.snippet: Eight people across the U.S. who registered to use Ashley Madison are suing the website for cheaters after hackers released personal and detailed information of millions of users, including financial data and sexual proclivities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eight people across the U.S. who registered to use Ashley Madison are suing the website for cheaters after hackers released personal and detailed information of millions of users, including financial data and sexual proclivities.

headline.main: UN to 'Act Immediately' if South Sudan Doesn't Sign Deal
headline.print_headline: UN to 'Act Immediately' if South Sudan Doesn't Sign Deal

docs.snippet: The U.N. Security Council says it is ready to "act immediately" if South Sudan's president doesn't sign a peace deal Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. Security Council says it is ready to "act immediately" if South Sudan's president doesn't sign a peace deal Wednesday.

headline.main: Turkey to Join Coalition's Air Fight Against Islamic State Soon-Pentagon
headline.print_headline: Turkey to Join Coalition's Air Fight Against Islamic State Soon-Pentagon

docs.snippet: The United States and Turkey have finalised technical details on an agreement to include Turkey in an international effort to bring down the Islamic State, fully integrating Turkey into the U.S.-led coalition's air strikes against the militant gro...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and Turkey have finalised technical details on an agreement to include Turkey in an international effort to bring down the Islamic State, fully integrating Turkey into the U.S.-led coalition's air strikes against the militant group, a Pentagon spokesman said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Tennessee Supreme Court Won't Hear Judge Joe Brown's Appeal
headline.print_headline: Tennessee Supreme Court Won't Hear Judge Joe Brown's Appeal

docs.snippet: The Tennessee Supreme Court is refusing to hear an appeal from former TV judge Joe Brown over a jail sentence for contempt of court....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Tennessee Supreme Court is refusing to hear an appeal from former TV judge Joe Brown over a jail sentence for contempt of court.

headline.main: CEO of Male Escort Site, 6 Workers Charged With Prostitution
headline.print_headline: CEO of Male Escort Site, 6 Workers Charged With Prostitution

docs.snippet: The chief executive of a Manhattan-based online male escort service and six of his employees at Rentboy.com were arrested Tuesday on charges of promoting prostitution....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chief executive of a Manhattan-based online male escort service and six of his employees at Rentboy.com were arrested Tuesday on charges of promoting prostitution.

headline.main: Flames Re-Sign Defenseman Giordano to Six-Year Extension
headline.print_headline: Flames Re-Sign Defenseman Giordano to Six-Year Extension

docs.snippet: All-Star defenseman Mark Giordano has been re-signed by the Calgary Flames on a six-year contract extension, the National Hockey League (NHL) team announced on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: All-Star defenseman Mark Giordano has been re-signed by the Calgary Flames on a six-year contract extension, the National Hockey League (NHL) team announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: U.S. Army Nears High-Stakes Award for Humvee Replacement
headline.print_headline: U.S. Army Nears High-Stakes Award for Humvee Replacement

docs.snippet: The U.S. Army is expected to award a contract on Tuesday for a new armored truck to replace thousands of aging Humvees, a long-awaited deal that could be worth up to $30 billion for the winning team....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Army is expected to award a contract on Tuesday for a new armored truck to replace thousands of aging Humvees, a long-awaited deal that could be worth up to $30 billion for the winning team.
